name: Pyramid Solitaire．
description:
Pyramid Solitaire is a popular solitaire game for the Apple Devices. This game comes from Ancient Egypt.

▪ GOAL
Remove all the cards on the pyramid and all the cards on the decks.

▪ RULE:
You can move cards to the Foundation by Double-Tap or dropping a card on another, exposed, card. If the ranks combine to 13, both cards will disappear. Kings, being rank 13, it will be disappeared when double clicked.

As this is a universal application, this solitaire game adapts to look and play perfectly on either your iPhone or iPad. If you like to relax with solitaire or puzzle games then we think you'll love a Pyramid Solitaire.
